create-password: First of all, you must create a different password for your electronic belongings.
you-cant-recover-pwd: You won't be able to recover your password, so remember it well.
create-optional-question: You can also create a hint to help you remember your master password.
label-optionalQuestion: Create a hint to remember your password (optional)
password-field-error-length-min: Password must contain at least 8 characters
password-field-error-length-max: The password must contain a maximum of 24 characters
password-field-error-no-number: The password must contain at least one number
password-field-error-no-uppercase: The password must contain at least one uppercase letter
password-field-error-no-lowercase: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter
optionalQuestion-error-length-max: The hint cannot be longer than 255 characters.
